messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] Article in the newspaper
messages.msgSnippet: ... I think there was an article about them a while back in Life Learning, wasn t there? Here it is--more recent than I thought it was:
messages.messageBody:
Gold Standard wrote:

> I know it's a small world and all, but here I am in the desert of Arizona
> reading an article from a little town I used to live in years
> ago...Exeter,
> NH.
>
> Cool article too! Nice and neutral, just stating the facts, no opinions or
> judgments added (Exeter is a great great town).
>
> And what a treat Bryson is! How fortunate you found each other! Any
> pictures
> of them thar Feendz's?
>


I think there was an article about them a while back in Life Learning,
wasn't there?

Here it is--more recent than I thought it was:
http://www.lifelearningmagazine.com/0602/index.html

This was a nice follow-up!

--
~~Danielle
Emily (8), Julia (7), Sam (6)
http://www.organiclearning.blogspot.com

~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*

messages.subject: RE: [AlwaysLearning] Article in the newspaper
messages.msgSnippet: I know it s a small world and all, but here I am in the desert of Arizona reading an article from a little town I used to live in years ago...Exeter, NH. Cool
messages.messageBody:
I know it's a small world and all, but here I am in the desert of Arizona
reading an article from a little town I used to live in years ago...Exeter,
NH.

Cool article too! Nice and neutral, just stating the facts, no opinions or
judgments added (Exeter is a great great town).

And what a treat Bryson is! How fortunate you found each other! Any pictures
of them thar Feendz's?

Thanks for sharing,
Jacki
